price: (Rabbiin) ni jedhe: “Sila dachii keessa lakkoofsa waggaa hangamii jiraattan?”
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
